data.title: List of Nobel Prize Winners
data.meta_description: Complete lists of winners of Nobel prize for chemistry, literature, peace, physics, physiology and medicine since 1901, and the Swedish Royal Bank Prize in Economic Sciences in Memory of Alfred Nobel also known as Nobel prize for economics since 1968, including laureates gender, age, citizenship and affiliation
